Contributing to BlockBall¶

Leave a like/review/diamond…¶

The easiest thing is to rate the plugin on spigotmc.org, planetminecraft.com or github.com. It encourages me to continue supporting BlockBall. :)

Supporting and Donating¶

New feature idea? Bug report?¶

All features the plugin is likely to receive in the future can be viewed at the issues section of BlockBall.

The easiest option to suggest new features or report bugs is to submit a new issue there. However, I do also take reports from the spigot comment section or private messages on spigot.
